TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BulletedList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class BulletedList Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler
type BulletedList = class inherit ListControl interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 建立產生項目符號格式之項目清單的控制項。

span.span: Creates a control that generates a list of items in a bulleted format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來建立格式化的項目清單項目符號。Use the control to create a list of items that are formatted with bullets. 若要指定您想要出現在個別清單項目控制項，放置物件的開頭和結尾標記之間的每個項目控制項。To specify the individual list items that you want to appear in a control, place a object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 若要指定要用來顯示清單項目中的項目符號型別控制項，並設定屬性設為其中所定義的項目符號類型列舉型別。To specify the bullet type to use to display list items in a control, set the property to one of the bullet types that are defined by the enumeration. 下表列出可用的項目符號樣式。The following table lists the available bullet styles. |項目符號樣式Bullet style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||未設定。Not set.| ||數字。A number.| ||小寫字母。A lowercase letter.| ||大寫字母。An uppercase letter.| ||小寫羅馬字母數字。A lowercase Roman numeral.| ||大寫羅馬數字。An uppercase Roman numeral.| ||實心的圓形。A filled circle.| ||空心圓圈。An empty circle.| ||實心的方形。A filled square.| ||自訂映像。A custom image.| 使用屬性來指定編號的清單項目已排序的起始值控制項。Use the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control. 值，指派給屬性會被忽略，如果屬性設定為， ， ，或欄位。The value that is assigned to the property is ignored, if the property is set to the , , , or field. 如果您設定屬性的值若要指定項目符號的自訂映像，您必須設定屬性也可指定影像檔的位置。If you set the property to the value of to specify a custom image for the bullet, you must set the property also to specify the location of the image file. 若要指定清單項目中的顯示行為，將屬性設為其中一個值，由定義列舉型別。To specify the display behavior of the list items in a , set the property to one of the values that are defined by the enumeration. 定義的顯示行為是一種， ，和。The defined display behaviors are , , and . 按一下超連結時，它會巡覽至的 URL。When a hyperlink is clicked, it navigates to a URL. 使用屬性來指定超連結巡覽至的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to. 使用屬性，以指定的框架或視窗顯示時按一下超連結瀏覽至網頁。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is navigated to when a hyperlink is clicked. 當屬性設定為，則控制項回傳至伺服器時按下的連結顯示清單項目。When the property is set to , the control displays list items as links that post back to the server when clicked. 若要以程式設計方式控制按一下連結按鈕時執行的動作，提供的事件處理常式事件。To programmatically control the actions that are performed when a link button is clicked, provide an event handler for the event. 請注意，並屬性繼承自類別，並不適用於控制項。Note that the and properties are inherited from the class and are not applicable to the control. 使用事件資料的類別，以判斷索引中的 [連結] 按鈕按下。Use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a that was clicked. 控制項也支援資料繫結。The control also supports data binding. 若要繫結到資料來源，您可以使用任何提供資料繫結機制。To bind the to a data source, you can use any of the provided data-binding mechanisms. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。For more information, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742). ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 根據預設，此控制項所呈現的標記，也可能不符合協助工具標準，例如 Web 內容的指導方針 1.0 (WCAG) 優先權 1 指導方針。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 如需有關此控制項的協助工具支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何建立與清單項目格式化為連結按鈕的控制項。The first code example demonstrates how to create a control with list items that are formatted as link buttons. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何建立控制使用資料繫結至指定的清單項目。The second code example demonstrates how to create a control using data binding to specify the list items. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與清單項目格式化為連結按鈕的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control with list items that are formatted as link buttons. 文字會顯示在控制當按下的清單項目。Text is displayed in a control when a list item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassExample/CS/bulletedlistclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClassExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassExample/VB/bulletedlistclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制使用資料繫結至指定的清單項目。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control using data binding to specify the list items. 清單項目會格式化為連結按鈕。The list items are formatted as link buttons. 文字會顯示在控制當按下的清單項目。Text is displayed in a control when a list item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClassDataBindExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassDataBindExample/CS/bulletedlistclass2databindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClassDataBindExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClassDataBindExample/VB/bulletedlistclass2databindvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示成 控制項中各個項目符號之影像的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for each bullet in a control.

value.span: 要顯示成 中各個項目符號之影像的路徑。

span.span: The path to an image to display as each bullet in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示在每個項目符號之影像的路徑控制項。Use the property to specify the path to an image to display as each bullet in a control. 若要指定項目符號的自訂映像，您也必須設定屬性設為值。To specify a custom image for the bullets, you must also set the property to the value . > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援屬性因為是原本就是裝飾項目符號，並不提供必須傳達透過輔助技術的其他資訊。The control does not support the property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology. 不過，如果您想要使用自訂映像來傳達給使用者的概念，您應該對其進行額外的文字加入每個項目符號清單項目或使用可讓您指定每個影像的替代文字的控制項。However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image. 您可以指定相對或絕對路徑到映像。You can specify either a relative or an absolute path to the image. 相對路徑與相關的網頁位置的映像的位置，但未指定伺服器上的完整路徑。A relative path relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您更輕鬆地將整個網站到另一個目錄移伺服器上，而不更新程式碼。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the code. 下列程式碼範例顯示的影像檔的相對路徑：The following code example shows a relative path to an image file: ```csharp \\Images\\image1.jpg ``` ```vb "Images\image1.jpg" ``` 下列程式碼範例顯示的影像檔的絕對路徑：The following code example shows an absolute path to an image file: ```csharp "c:\\MyImagesDir\\image1.jpg" ``` ```vb "c"\MyImagesDir\image1.jpg" ``` 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，並將屬性來指定要用於每個項目符號的自訂映像的路徑。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property to specify the path to a custom image to use for each bullet. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListBulletImageurl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListBulletImageUrl/CS/bulletimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListBulletImageurl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListBulletImageUrl/VB/bulletimageurlvb.aspx#1)]

related.span: BulletedList Web 伺服器控制項

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的項目符號樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the bullet style for the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要套用至清單項目中的項目符號樣式控制項。Use the property to specify the bullet style to apply to the list items in a control. 屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |項目符號樣式Bullet style|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||未設定。Not set.| ||數字。A number.| ||小寫字母。A lowercase letter.| ||大寫字母。An uppercase letter.| ||小寫羅馬字母數字。A lowercase Roman numeral.| ||大寫羅馬數字。An uppercase Roman numeral.| ||實心的圓形。A filled circle.| ||空心圓圈。An empty circle.| ||實心的方形。A filled square.| ||自訂映像。A custom image.| 指定值可讓您提供自己的映像，項目符號。Specifying the value allows you to supply your own image for the bullet. 如果您指定值，您也必須設定至自訂映像的 URL，以使用的屬性。If you specify the value, you must also set the property to the URL of the custom image to use. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援屬性因為是原本就是裝飾項目符號，並不提供必須傳達透過輔助技術的其他資訊。The control does not support the property because the bullets are inherently decorative and do not provide additional information that needs to be conveyed via assistive technology. 不過，如果您想要使用自訂映像來傳達給使用者的概念，您應該對其進行額外的文字加入每個項目符號清單項目或使用可讓您指定每個影像的替代文字的控制項。However, if you want to use a custom image to convey a concept to the user, you should add additional text to each of the bulleted list items or use a control that allows you to specify alternate text for each image. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control. A控制項中填入所有可用列舉值。A control is populated with all the available enumeration values. 根據使用者選取 從清單方塊的樣式項目符號樣式變更。The bullet style changes based on the style that the user selects from the list box. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListStylesExample/CS/bulletedliststylescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListStylesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListStylesExample/VB/bulletedliststylesvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的類型不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the values.

summary.span: 按一下 控制項中的連結按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a link button in a control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的清單項目時，會引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a list item in a control is clicked. 若要啟用的清單項目引發的控制項事件，屬性第一次必須設定為值。To enable list items in a control to raise the event, the property first must be set to the value . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 按一下清單項目時，訊息會顯示在頁面上的控制項。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. 項目符號清單中的所有連結按鈕都引發相同事件。All the link buttons in the bulleted list raise the same event. 若要判斷哪一個連結按鈕引發的事件，引數會進行檢查。To determine which link button raised the event, the argument is examined. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要套用至清單中的項目內容的顯示行為控制項。Use the property to specify the display behavior to apply to the content of list items in a control. 屬性設定使用其中一種列舉值。The property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |值Value|顯示為Displayed as| |-----------|------------------| ||文字。Text.| ||超連結。Hyperlinks.| ||連結按鈕。Link buttons.| 值可讓您顯示為超連結的清單內容。The value allows you to display list content as hyperlinks. 按一下時，超連結巡覽至 URL。When clicked, a hyperlink navigates to a URL. 使用屬性來指定超連結巡覽至的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL that a hyperlink navigates to. 欄位可讓您以連結方式顯示清單內容。The field allows you to display list content as links. 使用回傳給伺服器，按一下 [連結] 按鈕時的事件。Use the event to post back to the server when a link button is clicked. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，並將屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property. A控制項中填入列舉值。A control is populated with the enumeration values. 根據使用者選取 從清單方塊的顯示模式清單中的項目內容變更格式。The format of the list item content changes based on the display mode that the user selects from the list box. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/CS/bulletedlistdisplaymodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/VB/bulletedlistdisplaymodevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定已排序之 控制項中清單項目編號的起始值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control.

value.span: 在已排序之 控制項中清單項目編號的起始值。

span.span: The value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定編號的清單項目已排序的起始值控制項。Use the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in an ordered control. 值，指派給屬性會被忽略，如果屬性設定為， ， ，或值。The value that is assigned to the property is ignored, if the property is set to the , , , or values. 雖然值屬性是整數，它並不會永遠會導致項目符號呈現的數字。Although the value of the property is an integer, it does not always cause a bullet to render as a number. 例如，如果您設定屬性，以`4`並設定屬性設為值，第一個項目符號數字會轉譯為小寫字母 d。For example, if you set the property to `4` and set the property to the value , the first bullet number will render as a lowercase d. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，並將屬性，以指定的值清單中的項目編號起始控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property to specify the value that starts the numbering of list items in the control. 編號清單項目變更的起始值為基礎的使用者在文字方塊中輸入的值。The value that starts the numbering of the list items changes based on the value that the user enters in the text box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListFirstBulletNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListFirstBulletNumber/CS/firstbulletnumbercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListFirstBulletNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListFirstBulletNumber/VB/firstbulletnumbervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的清單項目時，會引發事件按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a list item in the control is clicked. 若要啟用的清單項目引發的控制項事件，您必須先設定屬性設為值。To enable list items in a control to raise the event, you must first set the property to the value . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 按一下清單項目時，訊息會顯示在頁面上的控制項。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，務必呼叫方法的基底類別，好讓註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在內部使用控制內的項目清單的 [連結] 按鈕按一下時。The method is used internally by the control when a link button within the item list is clicked. 包含頁面指定的索引中的已按下 [的連結] 按鈕`eventArgument`參數，用來初始化屬性物件。The containing page specifies the index of the clicked link button in the `eventArgument` parameter, which is used to initialize the property of a object. 方法會引發藉由傳遞初始化的事件物件方法。The method raises a event by passing the initialized object to the method. 方法可以執行驗證，再引發控制項事件。The method optionally can perform validation before raising the event for the control. 若要驗證的頁面中的連結按鈕上的控制項群組按一下時，設定屬性設`true`並指定要在驗證控制項群組屬性。To validate a group of controls on the page when a link button within the is clicked, set the property to `true` and specify the group of controls to be validated in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基底類別中， ，則屬性會傳回目前選取的項目以零為起始索引。In the base class, , the property returns a zero-based index of the currently selected item. 預設值為 -1，表示沒有選取任何項目。The default is -1, which indicates that nothing is selected. 屬性不是適用於控制項。The property is not applicable to the control. **附註**當您使用`get`存取子屬性，它一律會傳回`-1`。**Note** When you use the `get` accessor for the property, it always returns `-1`. 嘗試使用`set`存取子屬性會引發。An attempt to use the `set` accessor for the property raises a . 使用事件資料的類別，以判斷索引中的 [連結] 按鈕所按的控制項。Use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a control that was clicked. 此屬性不是可繫結在視覺化設計工具，但可在執行階段繫結。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架，在按一下 控制項中的超連結時，這個視窗或框架會顯示連結的網頁內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content that is linked to when a hyperlink in a control is clicked.

value.span: 目標視窗或框架，在按一下 中的超連結時，這個視窗或框架會載入連結的網頁。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in a is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必須以內範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫） 的特殊值以外，詳列於下表中，其開頭為底線的字母為開頭。Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the special values that are listed in the following table, which begin with an underscore. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|呈現即時運算框架組父項中的內容。Renders the content in the immediate frame-set parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 `_search` 目標值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. 使用屬性，以指定的框架或視窗顯示網頁中的超連結時，連結到按一下控制項時。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page that is linked to when a hyperlink in a control is clicked. 若要顯示成超連結的清單項目的內容控制項，並設定屬性設為值。To display the content of the list items as hyperlinks in a control, set the property to the value . 然後，設定至 URL 的網頁瀏覽至每個清單項目屬性。Then, set the property of each list item to the URL of the Web page to navigate to. 如果未設定屬性，瀏覽器或視窗具有焦點重新整理時按一下超連結。If the property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the hyperlink is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 屬性會轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性上`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許的項目。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未設定屬性如果轉譯的輸出，如必須與 XHTML 1.1 相容。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 在建立可存取網頁時，強烈建議您避免使用指向另一個視窗中的屬性。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制項，並將屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control and set the property. 當使用者選取顯示模式清單方塊中，從屬性設定為`_blank`新的瀏覽器視窗中顯示連結的頁面。When the user selects the display mode from the list box, the property is set to `_blank` to display the linked page in a new browser window. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListDisplaymode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/CS/bulletedlistdisplaymodecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListDisplaymode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListDisplayMode/VB/bulletedlistdisplaymodevb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 如果選取了 的其中一個項目，則為 的 ，否則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The of the , if one of the items in the is selected; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性繼承自類別，並不適用於控制項。The property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control. > [!NOTE] > 屬性在內部根據設定中的選取的清單項目控制項。The property is set internally based on the selected list item in the control. 如果您設定屬性直接擲回例外狀況。If you set the property directly, a exception is thrown. 雖然您無法存取的屬性控制項，您可以使用事件資料的類別，以判斷索引中的 [連結] 按鈕按下。While you cannot access the property of control, you can use the event data of the class to determine the index of the link button in a that was clicked. 然後您可以存取屬性控制項。You can then access the property of the control.
